title: The Root Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out
description: Espresso bar and organic bakery and vegetarian kitchen in downtown Lakewood. Offers organic whole wheat crust stone oven pizzas, old world dishes made with fresh herbs, vegetables, grains and legumes. Raw vegan dinner menu every Thursday. Makes its own almond milk as well as chocolate syrup (vegan). Counter service. Casual and cozy with music and art. Prices inexpensive to moderate.
